AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Create_or_Update_DNS_Zone
AlertOperationList.Description: Create or update a DNS zone within a resource group.  Used to update the tags on a DNS zone resource. Note that this command can not be used to create or update record sets within the zone.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Delete_DNS_Zone
AlertOperationList.Description: Delete the DNS zone, in JSON format. The zone properties include tags, etag, numberOfRecordSets, and maxNumberOfRecordSets.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_MX
AlertOperationList.Description: Create or update a record set of type ?MX? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_MX
AlertOperationList.Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?MX? from a DNS zone.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_AAAA
AlertOperationList.Description: Create or update a record set of type ?AAAA? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_AAAA
AlertOperationList.Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?AAAA? from a DNS zone.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_CNAME
AlertOperationList.Description: Create or update a record set of type ?CNAME? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_CNAME
AlertOperationList.Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?CNAME? from a DNS zone.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_A
AlertOperationList.Description: Create or update a record set of type ?A? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

AlertOperationList.Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_A
AlertOperationList.Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?A? from a DNS zone.
